tuv.seg: Services and supports for children
Seirbhísí agus tacaíocht do leanaí
Information on childhood education, including the role of the Department of Education and Skills
Eolas ar luathoideachais an pháiste, an ról atá ag an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna, polasaí an rialtais agus rialacháin cúram leanaí
This document is in: Education and Training > Pre-school education and childcare
This document is in: Oideachas agus Oiliúint > Oideachas Réamhscoile agus Cúram Leanaí
The primary legislation regulating child care policy is the Child Care Act 1991 which brought in considerable changes in relation to children in care
Is é an tAcht um Chúram Leanaí 1991 an phríomhreachtaíocht chun beartas chúram leanaí a rialú, rud a thug athruithe ollmhóra isteach maidir le leanaí i gcúram
Find out more here
Cúram leanaí Leas leanaí Cúram altrama
What is child abuse?
Céard is mí-úsáid leanaí ann?
To whom do I report suspicions of child abuse?
Cé dó a dtuairiscím amhras maidir le mí-úsáid leanaí?
International child abduction occurs when a child is unlawfully removed from a country or unlawfully retained in a country
Tarlaíonn fuadach idirnáisiúnta leanaí nuair a thógtar leanbh amach as tír go neamhdhleathach nó nuair a choinnítear iad i dtír go neamhdhleathach
The question of arranging for the return of a child who has been abducted internationally is governed by international law
Rialaíonn an dlí idirnáisiúnta an cheist maidir leis an leanbh a ndearnadh fuadach idirnáisiúnta air/uirthi a thabhairt ar ais abhaile
Youth Information Centres provide free, confidential information for young people and for people who work with young people
Cuireann Ionaid Eolais don Óige eolas saor in aisce, faoi rún ar fáil do dhaoine óga agus do dhaoine atá ag obair leis an óige
They hold information on a wide variety of subjects
Tá eolas ar fáil uathu ar ábhair éagsúla
Recreational activities for young people
Gníomhaíochtaí caitheamh aimsire do dhaoine óga

The overall objective of the National Recreation Policy for Young People is to provide a framework for the promotion of appropriate recreational opportunities for young people between the ages of 12 and 18. Find out more

Is é cuspóir foriomlán an Bheartais Náisiúnta Caitheamh Aimsire do Dhaoine Óga creatlach a sholáthar chun na deiseanna oiriúnacha caitheamh aimsire do dhaoine óga idir 12 agus 18 mbliana a chur chun cinn
This document is in: Travel and Recreation > Recreational activities in Ireland
This document is in: Taisteal agus Áineas > Caitheamh Aimsire in Éirinn

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Teaghlach agus Caidrimh"

Orduithe Urchoisc, Sábháilteachta agus Cosanta
